alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Morgan; Owen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 3:44PM EST until March 11 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River. Eel River at Bowling Green. .Ongoing and renewed flooding will continue or develop along portions of the East Fork White, White, and Wabash Rivers over the next 24 to 48 hours and beyond. River stages are rising again due to the one to over two and a half inches of rain received from Saturday night through this morning. Minor flooding is expected, which primarily impacts river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River below Eagle Valley Power Plant. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 603.5 feet, Blue Bluff Road just north of Blue Bluff Bridge has about six inches of water on it. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river will rise to 605.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall to 604.9 feet and begin rising again early tomorrow afternoon. It will rise to 605.2 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 603.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued by later this evening.
